str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To defraud, deprive of, despoil; mid: I endure deprivation; pass: To be bereft of. From apo and stereo; to despoil.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To act unjustly towards, injure, harm. From adikos; to be unjust, i.e. do wrong.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.
